resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105061</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105061</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Great Chief Justice at Home</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der große Oberrichter zu Hause</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La grande justice en chef à la maison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A justiça principal grande na HOME</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La giustizia principale grande nel paese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη Προϊστάμενος δικαιοσύνη στο σπίτι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gran principal justicia en el país</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers photos of John Marshall's residence in Richmond, Virginia. This website also describes how Marshall, who wrote 519 opinions in his 34 years as chief justice (1801-1835), transformed the Supreme Court from obscurity into a prominent, powerful institution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet Fotos des Wohnsitzes des John Marschalls in
Richmond, Virginia an. Diese Web site beschreibt auch, wie 
Marschall, der 519 Meinungen in seine 34 Jahre als Oberrichter 
(1801-1835) schrieb, das Höchste Gericht vom Obscurity in eine 
vorstehende, leistungsfähige Anstalt umwandelte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre des photos de la résidence du maréchal de 
John à Richmond, la Virginie. Ce site Web décrit également 
comment le maréchal, qui a écrit 519 avis en ses 34 années en tant 
que justice en chef (1801-1835), a transformé la cour suprême de 
l'obscurité en établissement en avant et puissant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece fotos da residência do marshall de John 
em Richmond, Virgínia. Este Web site descreve também como o 
marshall, que escreveu 519 opiniões em seus 34 anos como a justiça 
principal (1801-1835), transformou a corte suprema do obscurity em uma
instituição proeminente, poderosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre le foto della residenza del marshall del 
John a Richmond, la Virginia. Questo Web site egualmente 
descrive come il marshall, che ha scritto 519 opinioni durante i suoi 
34 anni come giustizia principale (1801-1835), ha trasformato la Corte
suprema da obscurity in un'istituzione prominente e potente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωτογραφίες προσφορών της κατοικίας John 
Marshall's στο Ρίτσμοντ, Βιρτζίνια. Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος 
περιγράφει επίσης πώς τακτοποιήστε, ο οποίος έγραψε 519 
απόψεις σε 34 έτη του δεδομένου ότι προϊστάμενος η δικαιοσύνη 
(1801-1835), μετασχημάτισε το ανώτατο δικαστήριο από το 
σκοτάδι σε ένα προεξέχον, ισχυρό όργανο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece las fotos de la residencia del ordenar de 
Juan en Richmond, Virginia. Este Web site también describe 
cómo el ordenar, que escribió 519 opiniones en sus 34 años como 
principal justicia (1801-1835), transformó el Tribunal Supremo de la 
oscuridad en una institución prominente, de gran alcance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105061</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-great-chief-justice-at-home</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
